title: Summoner name problem, plz help
body: My friend is starting to play lol and she wants her summoner name to be from an anime one of the names she wants has the word Gassai in it but it wont let her have it (i have checked and no other summoner exists with the same name) i've narrowed it down to being that the game wont for some reason allow the word "gass" was wondering why?? is this some slang I'm not aware of?

replies.body:
If the name in question is supposed to be taking inspiration from Yuno (Future Diary)'s surname, then its romanji is actually spelt as "Gasai" and not "Gassai".

See if this name works.

EDIT: But still, dunno why "Gassai" which is an extension of "Gass" isn't legal, considering it is like they go out of their ways to block every combination that has "Gass" in it, maybe it's a Rioter's account name who knows.

It is Yuno haha good spotting and we know its spelt 'Gasai' but that name is already taken as expected. 

ah ok maybe

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4heTaUjE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-06-23T07:19:56.360+0000)
>
> It is Yuno haha good spotting and we know its spelt 'Gasai' but that name is already taken as expected. 
> 
> ah ok maybe

She can always go for the subtle approach by quoting something Yuno said, like "Half moon is like me", for example.

As long as it's within the 16 character limit that is, spaces don't count as characters so yer (up to 2 consecutive spaces work I think), that's pretty cool.
Thanks for that idea thats a really good one! ill ask her if she wants to do that
riot confirmed for not supporting weebs, godbless.
Are you sure she is using Gassai as the summoner name and not the username?
